message: Let's start fair. 50/50 split seems reasonable, right?
I think I deserve a bit more since you rejected my fair offer. Let's see if you'll be more reasonable this time.
I'm willing to compromise, but 40/60 is too much. 55/45 feels like a more fair and balanced deal. Let's make this happen.
You've been stubborn so far, but I'm feeling generous. 70/30 is my final offer. Take it or leave it!
